attributes.action: Hold a truly democratic general election on the 8th April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country has had a change in leadership without democratic process, democracy has been stolen from us. This nation must stand together and take back our country from tyrants, both FOREIGN and DOMESTIC. We were promised a referendim on Europe, Labour Lied. We were promised a referendum on the single currency issues, Labour lied.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
